Sequence Information.Peptide Name: L1K8 (Hp1404 variant, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (85.71%) toScorpion	Hp1404L=K: 21%, I=G: 14%.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli AB94012 or ATCC25922 (MIC 50-100 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa AB93066 or ATCC9027 (MIC 25-100 ug/ml),  Gram+ S. aureus AB94004  or ATCC25923 or MRSA P1381 or MRSA P1374 (MIC 6.25-25 ug/ml).Toxicity: human RBC: HC50: >>400 ug/ml, ~10% hemo.lytic at 400 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Li Z, Liu G, Meng L, Yu W, Xu X, Li W, Wu Y, Cao Z.2016
Literature Information.Title: K1K8: an Hp1404-derived antibacterial peptide.
